definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Lidocaine is also prescribed for people with very sore throats and those with canker sores in the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 利多卡因也用於喉嚨痛和口腔潰瘍患者。

sentences.english: The outcome of these two lidocaine local anaesthesia was compared.
sentences.chinese: 比較兩種利多卡因局麻方式的效果。

sentences.english: Aim To study the cutaneous permeation kinetics and pharmacodynamics of lidocaine gel.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究利多卡因凝膠的經皮吸收動力學以及藥效學。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effect of local anesthesia for child by oral intake of lidocaine hydrochloride.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小兒口服鹽酸利多卡因膠漿的局麻效果。

sentences.english: Results As to anesthetic effect, the ratio of excellence in articaine group was significant higher than that in lidocaine group.
sentences.chinese: 結果碧蘭麻組麻醉優良率明顯高於利多卡因組。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION There was no skin sensitization on cavia cobaya.
sentences.chinese: 結論複方利多卡因噴霧劑無皮膚致敏作用。

sentences.english: METHODS: All patients were injected lidocaine in psoas muscles under CT guidance.
sentences.chinese: 兩組患者均在CT引導下行腰大肌肌溝利多卡因阻滯。

sentences.english: AIM: To evaluate the influence of lidocaine on stress reaction.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究利多卡因對應激反應的影響。

sentences.english: The most commonly used is 'Lidocaine' spray.
sentences.chinese: 最常用的是“利多卡因”噴霧。

sentences.english: The intraocular injection of 2% preservative-free Lidocaine has potential danger to corneal endothelium cells.
sentences.chinese: 前房內注入2%利多卡因對兔眼角膜內皮有一定損害。

definition: atropine C17H23NO3, alkaloid drug derived from deadly nightshade (Atropa belladonna)
